website_summaries.verdict: This solid sterling silver name necklace has a classic design without being too showy.
pros: You can choose a customized option if the name you want isn't on the list, though it will take longer to arrive

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! The necklace is lightweight but not chintzy or cheap—best of both worlds. My skin is usually sensitive to jewelry but I have had no issues with this necklace. The gold color is nice and shiny, very eye catching. Font 4 is a good dupe for the “Faith” necklace from Sex and the City which is what I was looking for. I like how you can preview the different fonts before purchase to give you a decent idea of what the necklace will look like.
customer_reviews.author: Corynna Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Writing is nice, great style, and quality is in line with the price. Not sure high end, but it seems like it'll last. I'll post an update in a few months about how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Phillips Halsey

customer_reviews.title: My daughter LOVES, LOVES, LOVES this neck lace .
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES, LOVES, LOVES this necklace and the fact the I personalized it. She keeps telling me how much she loves it and never takes it off.
customer_reviews.author: Griffith Rita

customer_reviews.title: I love this necklace.
customer_reviews.text: I love this necklace I just ordered a new one . This nice is nice in size and doesn’t irritate my skin nor does it turn me green or leave any rashes. I have very sensiative skin and I sleep in this necklace , shower , the pool, beach all of that.
customer_reviews.author: Gardner Diana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this necklace. Got the gold style for my 7 year old “Alexa”, it is sturdy and though a little too yellow still looks beautiful around her neck. Everyone has complimented her on it.
customer_reviews.author: Yaime

customer_reviews.title: Legible. Cheap metal.
customer_reviews.text: It was definitely not 925 sterling as advertised. It is clearly legible. Hopefully it’ll hold up ok. I would not purchase again at full price unless it was for sure 925. I read on another review that the clasp was hard to open. I found that to be true for me at first as well, but I used something to push the clip in (vs pulling the clasp) to open it. Afterward, it opened & closed smoothly. Great little starter nameplate for a young kiddo.
customer_reviews.author: SalesMarketingPro79

customer_reviews.title: It looks very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Product comes as listed. The chain gets kinks throughout the day but doesn’t take much to undo it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift and it is exactly as described. Daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good things about this necklace so far! It's beautiful, shiny and well made. I'm so excited to wear it. the size if just perfect..
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Homer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: This necklace was everything I was hoping for because it was a gift for my little sister. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Grover

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved this. It's held its beautiful color. She wears it all the time. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: moonbuds

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this I got it if my gf name and I absolutely adore it I bought another one with my name on it to give to her I’m just waiting to buy it
customer_reviews.author: Briana Farrington

customer_reviews.title: Cute but no gift box
customer_reviews.text: Necklace is really cute and looks like good quality. I took a star because in the description it says it comes in a cute gift box or pouch. The one I ordered came in a cheap plastic bag. Since it was a gift, I had to buy a small jewelry box separately.
customer_reviews.author: J&M

customer_reviews.title: not 16inches in length, but it is super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the necklace... But because of the description of the necklace, I was under the impression that it was going to be a choker style, or at least a 16inch. So I will have to get it resized somewhere which will cost me more$$. For now I tied a knot on each side of the chain so it is at the length that I wanted it to be.
customer_reviews.author: ashley621

customer_reviews.title: Great necklace
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter for Christmas! She absolutely loved it! It has yet to tarnish. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Holly Veth

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: It arrived just as described. My daughter will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: So Pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Just received my necklace and it’s beautiful. The chain is very danty but can be changed if needed. I am very satisfied and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: rachna

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in February for my daughters birthday (March 26th) present. Today was the day I gave it to her and she used it and it already broke. The chain is nothing like the picture. Very poor quality. My daughter is 12.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely ❤️It!!!
customer_reviews.text: This necklace is amazing I have taken showers wearing it sweated with it on still same color not once started to fade or get Tarnished great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn calloway

customer_reviews.title: 😞
customer_reviews.text: It’s was to big for my granddaughter who is 3 yrs old so I sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to open the clamp
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to understand the name , very cheap chain, turned a different color in less than a week
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT buy for the price especially!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and comes in a beautiful gift box with jewelry storage bag as well. EXCELLENT buy for the price especially!
customer_reviews.author: Sheppard Byron

customer_reviews.title: Scratched
customer_reviews.text: Came scratched and with the wrong birthstone on it. Submitting for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Personalized necklace is my favorite. I love jewelry. I honestly recommend. You should have it too!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Levin

customer_reviews.title: Name necklace
customer_reviews.text: My necklace is amazing and even though it arrived quite late, I was satisfied with what I got!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Daigle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Necklace came very fast! It is a perfect gift and I highly suggest it!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Semler

customer_reviews.title: How will they no
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t give me a spot to personalize my name
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the order I placed. It got here fast and is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Please don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this necklace, and reason why I bought it is because it is a 925 but way this is not true necklace is Rustin like some old thin pan please don't buy it it's a peace a crop
customer_reviews.author: primmy.

customer_reviews.title: Described perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. She got her middle name for Christmas and wears it almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly G

customer_reviews.title: Came on time as promised
customer_reviews.text: I like the necklace but it kept twisting up almost broke.
customer_reviews.author: Frela 51

product_meta.title: AsiaRhyme 925 Sterling Silver Personalized Name Necklace Pendant Custom Made with Any Names
product_meta.description:
1.Material: stainless steel, 14 K gold plated .

2.Standard shipping: 10-25 business days to US, 15-35 business days to other countries.

3.Expedited Shipping: 4-7 business days to US, 5-10 business days to other countries.






PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Department :Boys
 * Date First Available :January 2, 2019
 * Manufacturer :AsiaRhyme
 * ASIN :B07M6KGR3M

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #265,165 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #953 inBoys' Necklaces 
    *  #3461 inWomen's Pendants 
    *  #2696 inMen's Necklaces 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.4 out of 5 stars122 ratings 

1.Material: stainless steel, 14 K gold plated .

2.Standard shipping: 10-25 business days to US, 15-35 business days to other countries.

3.Expedited Shipping: 4-7 business days to US, 5-10 business days to other countries.
feature_bullets: ❤You just choose your favorite color & chain's length and enter the name by click on "Customize Now" Add to cart and check out. (Max: 8-10 letters. No punctuation or symbol )

AsiaRhyme letters will be engraved elaborately to give you a meaningful necklace with perfect details. a good way to treat yourself or a special gift for someone you love at Mother's day, Father's Day, birthday or anniversary.

The chain of the necklace is adjustable. Length varies from 14 in (35.5 cm) to 22 in (55.8 cm). Thickness of the pendant is 1.3mm. (No return or exchange unless defective when you receive it because it is a personalized item.)
The product is made of brass and plated gold, will not deform easily. AsiaRhyme passed the examination of Amazon's Fine Jewelry category. Every AsiaRhyme product has passed SGS Quality Certification.
Please don't hesitate to contact us whenever you have any concern about this item. It will be our pleasure to give you a wonderful shopping experience.
